text: int main ( ) { int t , i , sum , n , min ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } min = a [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < min ) min = a [ i ] ; } sum = min * ( n - 1 ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
